lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sterling opened at 2.951/955 marks, just under yesterday's closing 2.954/958, and was seen firming further against major currencies on a wave of popularity for British prime minsiter Margaret Thatcher's ruling Conservatives.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The dollar opened easier in quiet trading and should stay firmly entrenched in its established range ahead of this week's round of international finance meetings, dealers said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Sterling is looking very healthy at the moment," one dealer said, adding that Japanese security houses bought pounds at the start of trading.
